Must Try Local Cuisine

Authentic Bengali Flavors

We highly recommend authentic Bengali cuisine featuring Fish Crab Prawn Lamb curries & Vegetable preparations & Rice, Rosogolla, Mishti Doi & Sondesh. Experience the true flavors of Bengal!

Authentic Fish Curries

Fresh river and sea fish prepared with traditional Bengali spices and mustard oil, bringing you the true taste of Bengal's waters

Crab & Prawn Delicacies

Coastal specialties featuring fresh seafood with authentic Bengali preparations, perfect for seafood lovers

Traditional Sweets

Famous Rosogolla, Mishti Doi & Sondesh - the perfect end to your Bengali meal with centuries-old recipes
